summary: The lead singer of a band gets drafted for war in Vietnam. So as not to break up the band, he decides to shoot his own foot.
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio|Jake Busey|Bradley Gregg|Darin Heames|Michael Rapaport|Merle Kennedy|Sarah Lassez|Robin Swid
keywords: barefoot male|camera shot of bare feet|camera shot of feet|narrative|vietnam
title: The Foot Shooting Party
